name: Local AnimeFLV JS Provider
description: JavaScript-based onlinestream-provider using a local jimov AnimeFLV API.
author: You
payload: class Provider{constructor(){this.baseUrl="http://100.91.179.28:3003/anime/flv";}getSettings(){return{episodeServers:["default"],supportsDub:false};}async search(opts){const res=await fetch(this.baseUrl+"/search/"+encodeURIComponent(opts.query));if(!res.ok)return[];const d=await res.json();return[{id:d.slug,title:d.name,url:this.baseUrl+"/name/"+d.slug,subOrDub:"sub"}];}async findEpisodes(id){const res=await fetch(this.baseUrl+"/name/"+id);if(!res.ok)return[];const a=await res.json();return a.episodes.map(e=>({id:id,number:e.number,url:e.url,title:e.name}));}async findEpisodeServer(ep,sv){const res=await fetch(this.baseUrl+"/episode/"+ep.number);if(!res.ok)throw new Error(res.statusText);const j=await res.json();const s=j.servers[0];return{server:s.name,headers:{},videoSources:[{url:s.file_url,type:"hls",quality:"auto",subtitles:[]}]};} }new Provider();
